segments.text: Is this the Friendship Hospital ? Please send an ambulance to 68 Hu Nan Road .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it urgent ? Our ambulances are not enough to meet every call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . It's urgent . I think the partie nt is suffering from acute appendicitis . He may die if not treated in time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , we'll come right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( after a while ... ) Where's the patient ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's there in the room . He's very ill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . We'll put him in the stretcher . You are coming with us ? Step in please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Carry him into the emergency ward . Here we are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Help the patient bathe and change his clothes , nurse . Then bring him into the operating room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( after a while ... ) I'm his guide . What's the trouble with him , doctor
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He had appendicitis , but is all right now that it was removed . He'll have to rest for a few weeks to recover .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I send food for him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , outside food is not permitted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I come round to see him tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . But first you must observe the visiting hours , It's from 2 to 5 p . m . By the way , consult the nurse before you enter the ward .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , you can bring some flowers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When could I take care of him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our nurse can take good care of him .
segments.speaker: S1
